summary: Love Lasts Three Years (original title: L'Amour dure trois ans) is a 2011 French-Belgian comedy film written and directed by Frédéric Beigbeder.
cast:
Gaspard Proust : Marc Marronnier
Louise Bourgoin : Alice
JoeyStarr : Jean-Georges
Jonathan Lambert : Pierre
Frédérique Bel : Kathy
Nicolas Bedos : Antoine
Elisa Sednaoui : Anne
Anny Duperey : Marc's mother
Bernard Menez : Marc's father
Thomas Jouannet : Surf teacher
